tool_description: The Live and Upcoming Cricket Score Info API provides real-time scoring and match updates for all major cricket tournaments and leagues around the world. It is a comprehensive and easy-to-use API that can be integrated into your website, app, or other digital product to provide your users with the latest cricket scores and information.
name: Live Cricket Score & Upcoming Matches
title: Live Cricket Score & Upcoming Matches

api_list.name: Fetch Data
api_list.description: Get Live Score and Upcoming Matches Info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-cricket-score-upcoming-matches.p.rapidapi.com/static-content/10s/cricket-liupre.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-cricket-score-upcoming-matches.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
